name: Stasis (itch) (HTML_Earth)
description:
What happens when the Gman puts you in stasis? He challenges you to a card game.

Stasis is a fan game made without approval from Valve or Daniel Mullins.

I highly recommend you play or watch Inscryption before this. It's a great game, and I don't want to spoil your experience of it.

PHOTOSENSITIVITY:

To disable the flickering light from the holo projector, open the console by pressing F12 and type 'flicker', then close the console again with F12. This takes effect the next time the projector turns on. I didn't have enough time to add it to the options menu.
